bubbles.text: Hello?
Hey, numbnuts.
Oh great. Toshi? What do you want?
Wow, rude A.F. That's not how you speak to someone who still has blackmail material on you.
We're mutually blackmailing each other, so it doesn't count.
Anyway, do you need something?
Not really. I wouldn't choose an insecure method of communication for anything important.

choices.fullText: Aw, no way. You're lonely, so you just wanted to chat?

bubbles.text: More like, annoy you and waste your time.

choices.fullText: That's nice and all, but this is my work number. If you don't have a job for me, you're going to have to reach me after hours.

bubbles.text: Fine, fine. The truth is, there's this guy who pisses me off, and I want him dead.
He goes by the name Hotspot--at least that's his streamer name. Kind of dumb if you ask me, but not as dumb as his real name.
Anyway, he spends most of his time in an elite, guarded internet cafe. I'll message you the address securely.
You gotta be careful--he's hotheaded and won't back down without a fight. His goons will also try to stop you.
But I know it's nothing you can't handle. I'll pay you the full amount upfront.
Oh and for your information, I don't find this to be something important, which is why I've called this line.

choices.fullText: I dunno, sounds to me like you might have a vendetta against this guy. What's your gripe with him?

bubbles.text: What, do you need me to provide a reason for why I want him dead? Maybe fill out a worksheet first?
I'm only curious. I'm asking as a friend.
I hope that means I get a friend discount.
Well, he fucked up and made one of my hacks public.
It can't be traced back to me, but letting him screw up once is more than enough.
So yeah, aside from being a total dickwad for stealing my code and preventing me from reusing that hack, he's a liability, and he needs to be eliminated.

choices.fullText: Excellent. That's the kind of story I was looking for.
I say this as a friend, Toshi... it sounds like you're overreacting a bit.

bubbles.text: Yeah, so are you satisfied?
Quite.
Listen, just do this one thing for me and I'll stop leasing your processing power to other hackers.
... Excuse me?
*click*
Aargh! I hate them so much!
I-I'm sure they were just joking?

choices.text: Whatever. Let's just do the job

bubbles.text: So... you're not gonna do the job?
What can I say? I handle jobs on a case-by-case basis.
Are you being serious right now?
Nah, I'm just messing with you.
Ugh! So annoying. Forget what I said about payment upfront. Just go and kill him already.
